content: One option to rent kayaks or canoes for a day trip in Hague, Virginia is to contact the Westmoreland State Park located at 145 Cliff Road in Montross, VA. They offer kayak, canoe, and paddleboard rentals for use on the Potomac River. Another option is to check out Northern Neck Kayaking & Outdoor Rentals located at 126 Jessie duPont Memorial Highway in Burgess, VA. They offer kayak and canoe rentals and tours on various waterways in the Northern Neck region including the Great Wicomico River and the Chesapeake Bay.
